name: Danger Charge
description:
Is a simple game for the Mini Jam 73, where you have to charge up enemy robots, and use their attacks to open a path towards your goal. Controls

- Use the WASD/Arrow Keys to move your character

- Use the Left Mouse Button to give a charge to an enemy, and the Right Mouse Button to take charges from them

The more charges an enemy has, the faster it moves and attacks, making progress faster, but a lot more dangerous!
